tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE email_campaign_data (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    email_recipients INT,
    click_through_rate FLOAT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE email_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_recipients INT,
    total_clicks INT,
    total_conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_emails (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    recipient_email VARCHAR(255),
    email_opened BOOLEAN,
    click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    conversion_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Campaign (
 campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 campaign_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 start_date DATE NOT NULL,
 end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignStats (
 stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_id INT REFERENCES Campaign(campaign_id),
 open_rate FLOAT NOT NULL,
 click_rate FLOAT NOT NULL,
 conversion_rate FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
 campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 total_recipients INT,
 open_rate FLOAT,
 click_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE recipients (
 recipient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 email_address VARCHAR(255),
 first_name VARCHAR(50),
 last_name VARCHAR(50),
 subscription_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE clicks (
 click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_id INT,
 recipient_id INT,
 click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (recipient_id) REFERENCES recipients(recipient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE opens (
 open_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 campaign_id INT,
 recipient_id INT,
 open_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES campaigns(campaign_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (recipient_id) REFERENCES recipients(recipient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
  campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Contacts (
  contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  subscription_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SentEmails (
  email_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
  contact_id INT REFERENCES Contacts(contact_id),
  sent_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  delivery_status VARCHAR(20)
);
